title: Flood and Fire
description: Auriella joins the ranks of the Immortals, but Azrael has gone missing. She struggles to control the new strength of her powers as she prepares for her first mission. Instead of searching for Azrael, the druids ask her to search for another Neviahan, Alamar. Anxious to finish her mission so she can start her search for Azrael, she quickly finds Alamar, but he is not what she expects and can't be trusted. Auriella must convince Alamar to join with the Watchers before the Rebellion recruits him to the Shadow Legion.
author: Deirdra Eden
